title: Move localized price off Landing and replace with a new image

requirements.text: Remove the localized price display from the Landing screen so no price/currency amount is shown on the Landing page.

quotes: let the price be displayed before generation not in the landing page. looks very bad.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing screen no longer renders the price label or localized amount.
Landing screen no longer depends on the regional pricing hook just to show price (no unused pricing UI remains).

requirements.text: Ensure the localized price is displayed on the Input & Payment flow before caricature generation (i.e., on the Input & Payment screen prior to starting generation), using the existing regional pricing logic.

quotes: let the price be displayed before generation not in the landing page.

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is on the Input & Payment screen (before generation starts), the localized price is visible.
Price shown uses the existing regional price detection (ipapi-based) and formatting already used elsewhere.

requirements.text: Replace the removed Landing price area with a new visually appealing static image on the Landing screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing screen displays the new static image asset in place of the removed price section.
The image is loaded as a static frontend asset (not fetched via the backend).
Landing layout remains responsive and visually balanced at mobile and desktop widths.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Keep the backend as-is (no new backend pricing/payment logic).
Store and serve any new images as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not route images through the backend).
nonGoals: Changing the regional price detection endpoint (https://ipapi.co/json/) or the fixed price mapping logic.
Adding real payment processing beyond the existing mock/placeholder approach.
Redesigning unrelated screens (Auth/Result) beyond what is necessary to support the Landing change.
